title: JOIN THE FAMILY!
body:
Heaps of us are looking for players in our teams atm there are 6 captains 
so six teams and what eva rank u are there is a place for u in here top bot 
adc sup jg  there's always a spot for u and were still trying to get this tournament 
 thing together when all teams with their best players do a 5v5 and vs each other 
and all the players on the winning side get a random free skin or champ and don't
 worry if most of the teams are full we're looking to make the biggest league teams 
eva so add me LF Shorty and just tell me if you'd like to be a captain or recruit just 
msg me and we'll find a place for you {{item:3078}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:203}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Add me fam.
Need some chill games once in a while
you typed LF sorty not Lf shorty js mate
